lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Behind the Scenes at the Beauty Pageant

sentence.idiomatic: I hear that he keeps a university student as a mistress.
She is the mistress of a rich businessman.
That man she's involved with is a little old, isn't he?
Don't get involved in other people's business.
Can we not pay attention to your affairs?
You don't have to manage this, I will do it.
He is a man with no shame.
She really has no shame, that she could do that kind of thing!
She is even after her good friend's husband--she has no shame.
A lot of sales promotions have a hidden agenda.
Is there something going on behind the scenes of this competition that we don't know about?
We hope that someone can reveal the inside story behind this incident.
Older brothers shouldn't pick on their little sisters.
Why do you always pick on me?
When I was small, as soon as I got picked on I would run home crying to mother.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch--let's wait and see!
Things won't work out between them. If you don't believe me then we'll just wait and see.

word.literal: to have no choice but to

sentence.idiomatic: We don't know what the situation will be like later. We have no choice but to wait and see.
It's really so unfair!
What's wrong?
That Liu Jia, she's involved with a sponsor.
Huh? How do you know?
Don't concern yourself with how I know. All I know is that I'm definitely not wrong.
I never thought that she would be willing to sell herself for the sake of winning the title.
It's really shameful.
If she has a supporter helping her, we definitely have no hope.
No way! I have to let everyone know what is going on behind the scenes.
Yes! We can't be trodden on by her.
I'm going to call a reporter right now.
Hmph! Liu Jia, we'll see how things go for you!
